headline: Carrier Balances Mixed Q4, AI Push And Portfolio Shift In HVAC Pivot
summary: Carrier Global (NYSE:CARR) reported mixed Q4 and full year results, with weakness in residential HVAC and strength in commercial and data center activity. The company highlighted strong growth in data center orders and aftermarket services, pointing to continued demand from non residential customers. Carrier introduced a generative AI feature called "Tell Me More" in its Abound platform to help address technician shortages in the field. The company updated investors on its shift toward a...
